Class CinemaBookingSystem

java.lang.Object
CinemaBookingSystem
public class CinemaBookingSystem extends Object
This is the system of the Cinema Booking final project. It will use classes named Showing, Theater, Customer, Film, Booking, Row, & Seat to manage a cinema's bookings.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CinemaBookingSystem()
    Creates the CinemaBookingSystem object, with text input for certain parameters.
    CinemaBookingSystem(int numOfTheaters, int rows, int seats)
    Creates the CinemaBookingSystem object, with parameters, assuming identical theaters.

      public ArrayList<Showing> listShowingsForTime(LocalDate date, LocalTime time)
      Prints the showings for a given date and time, given via text input.
      Parameters:
      date - The showing date.
      time - The showing time, or up to one hour earlier.
